sentences.sContent: The tragedy happened as they were returning home from a night out.
sentences.sCn: 悲剧发生在他们夜里外出归来的路上。

sentences.sContent: Tragedy struck the family when their two-year-old son was killed in an accident.
sentences.sCn: 悲剧降临到这个家庭，他们两岁的儿子在一次事故中丧生。

words.tran: 悲剧的；悲剧性的；悲惨的；不幸的

trans.tranCn: 悲剧； 惨事， 灾难
trans.tranOther: a very sad event, that shocks people because it involves death
